UNITED STATES SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE
COMMISSION Washington, D.C. 20549 FORM 6-K
Report of Foreign Private Issuer Pursuant to
Rule 13a-16or 15d-16 under the Securities
Exchange Act of 1934 For the month of May 2021
Commission File Number: 001-13928 Royal Bank
of Canada (Translation of registrants name
into English)
                                              
  200 Bay Street        1 Place Ville Marie

  Toronto, Ontario      Canada H3B 3A9        
  Canada M5J 2J5        Attention: Senior

on Form 6-K,managements discussion and
analysis and unaudited interim condensed
consolidated financial statements included in
exhibit 99.2, and exhibit 99.3 hereto are
incorporated by reference as exhibits into the
Registration Statement on Form F-3(File No.
333-227001)and the Registration Statements on
Form S-8(File Nos. 333-12036, 333-12050,
333-13052, 333-13112, 333-117922, 333-207754,
333-207750, 333-207748and 333-252536).

Signatures Pursuant to the requirements of the
Securities Exchange Act of 1934, the
registrant has duly caused this report to be
signed on its behalf by the undersigned,
thereunto duly authorized.
